messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Consensual Living
messages.msgSnippet: -=-In the file you will find a short article written by Anna M. Brown entitled, Creating a Climate for Consensual Living .-=- I don t want to join a mailing
messages.messageBody:
-=-In the file you will find a short article written by Anna M. Brown
entitled, "Creating a Climate for Consensual Living".-=-

I don't want to join a mailing list to see a file. Is there
information about it you want to share with people short of having
them join a list? Tell us what you like about it, what's different
or special or useful.

At least give the link to its main page instead of just a
subscription link, please, if you think it's interesting enough, or
maybe there are webpages people can get in and out of without having
to deal with more e-mail or dropping back off a list.

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Consensual Living
messages.msgSnippet: I have found another yahoo group which I am enjoying so I thought I would pass on to anyone else who might like to check it out.
messages.messageBody:
I have found another yahoo group which I am enjoying so I thought I
would pass on to anyone else who might like to check it out.

consensual-living-subscribe@yahoogroups.com

In the file you will find a short article written by Anna M. Brown
entitled, "Creating a Climate for Consensual Living".

Additionally there is a "Consensual Living Book List" which has many
of the titles I have also seen recommended in unschooling circles.

Joanne
dh: Charlie
ds: Kevin
Lake Carmel, NY
